movies.title: Joseph's Reunion
movies.plot: The drought had stripped Canaan bare of crops, yet rumors from Egypt described impossibly vast storehouses of food. Jacob knew that unless he acted soon, his entire family would starve, so at last he sent ten of his sons to Pharaoh to buy provisions. They never imagined that there they would find not only food, but the brother they had long ago betrayed and given up for dead.
movies.simplePlot: The classic story from the Bible of Joseph in Egypt, reuniting with his brothers and his Father.

biography.bio: Brian Nissen is a writer and actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The King and I (1999).
biography.name: Brian Nissen

biography.bio: Neil Vipond was born on December 24, 1929 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He is an actor, known for Paradis (1982), The Fair (1999) and The Day the World Ended (2001).
biography.name: Neil Vipond

biography.bio: Robert Cottrell is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Last Prophet (2002), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and The Greatest Is the Least (1997).
biography.name: Robert Cottrell

biography.bio: William Dennis Hunt is an actor, known for Critters 3 (1991), Flesh Gordon (1974) and Evan Almighty (2007).
biography.name: William Dennis Hunt

biography.bio: Jake Williamson is an actor, known for The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997), Token: The Web Series (2014) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Jake Williamson

biography.bio: Michael Altobello is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Last Prophet (2002), The Vampire Diaries (1996) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Michael Altobello

biography.bio: Paul O'Connor is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Paul O'Connor

biography.bio: Gar Campbell was born on November 9, 1943 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Gar Clive Campbell. He was an actor, known for Fright Night Part 2 (1988), Dream On! (1981) and Animated Hero Classics (1991). He died on December 20, 2007 in Los Angeles.
biography.name: Gar Campbell

biography.bio: Mark Hunt is an actor, known for Parables of Jesus (2003), The King and I (1999) and Muhammad: The Last Prophet (2002).
biography.name: Mark Hunt
